column1: obituary for: emma jean collins | skelton funeral home| louisville
column9: at home. services will be 2 p. m. monday
column12: at skelton funeral home chapel with rev. david blakney officiating. burial will follow in backbone cemetery with skelton funeral home of reform directing. visitation will be sunday
column15: from 5 to 7 p. m. at the funeral home. she was preceded in death by her parents; brothers
column16: cliff hall and hubert hall; and sister
column17: millie johnson. survivors include her husband
column20: jr.; and a number of nieces and nephews. jean was born february 9
column23: alabama to the late otto hall
column24: sr. and lela patrick hall. she owned and operated her own thrift store.
